question:
START pseudocode

SET a = 5

SET b = 2
a = a + b
b = a - b
a = a - b
DISPLAY a, b
END pseudocode

START pseudocode

SET num = 1234
SET x= 0

WHILE num > 0
SET digit = num % 10
SET x= (x * 10) + digit
SET num = num / 10
ENDWHILE

DISPLAY x

END pseudocode
